title: Defense spending as share of GDP in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 1980 to 2018
yAxis: Defense spending as share of GDP
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Defense spending as share of GDP. In total the number of data points it has is 39.
In general Defense spending as share of GDP has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1981 and 1982.
The highest Defense spending as share of GDP, of value 5.5 was reached at Year 1984
Minimum Defense spending as share of GDP about 2.1 was reached at Year 2015,  2016,  2017, and 2018
